rules_text: When Kotohime enters, for each opponent, choose up to one artifact, creature, or planeswalker they control. Exile them until Kotohime leaves the battlefield.
flavor_text:
[i]“Noblewoman, collector, and according only to herself, a policewoman. Must be nice to have that much free time...”
—Chiyuri Kitashirakawa[/i]
